Is nero best to write this torrent to a DVD. I want to run this on a standalone dvd player...

monitg: Yes, use Nero and select DVD video from the choices on the left (or first screen) then drag the Video_TS contents into the Video_TS folder.
Nothing goes in the Audio_TS folder.

gotmib: see above. There shouldn't be any audio files. These VOB IFO BUP files are your video audio infomation and backup files in DVD format. The audio is slipstreamed in these files, so again, nothing goes into the audio folder. If you are not getting audio while trying to run this (not from a DVD) on your computer, then either a) turn speakers up :D   (or/and)
b) download the latest audio codecs. That sounds like your problem....not this torrent. :)

Yes, this is a rip of DVD files intended to be burned to DVD in order to play in a DVD player; not meant to be watched on VLC / MPCStar / WMPlayer / etc. Almost all torrents created for this purpose are around 4.35 GB in total size.
